description: Quickbooks is a cloud-based accounting software that helps you manage your finances, track your income and expenses, and get insights into your business

tools.name: QUICKBOOKS_CREATE_ACCOUNT
tools.description: Create a new account in QuickBooks with the given parameters.

name.title: Name
name.description: User recognizable name for the Account. Account.Name attribute must not contain double quotes (") or colon (:).

account_type.title: AccountType
account_type.description: Type of the account to be created

account_number.title: Account Number
account_number.description: User-defined account number to help the user in identifying the account within the chart-of-accounts and in deciding what should be posted to the account. must not contain colon (:). For France locales:

account_sub_type.title: BankAccSubType
account_sub_type.description: Sub-type of the account. Must use exact enum values (no spaces/slashes). Examples: 'AdvertisingPromotional' (NOT 'Advertising/Promotional'), 'Checking', 'Inventory', 'OtherCurrentAssets', 'Vehicles', 'RetainedEarnings', 'Insurance', 'InterestEarned'. See QuickBooks API docs for complete list.

tools.name: QUICKBOOKS_CREATE_CUSTOMER
tools.description: Create a new customer in QuickBooks with the given parameters.

title.title: Title
title.description: Title of the person (max 16 characters - keep it short like 'Mr.', 'Dr.', 'CEO'). This tag supports i18n, all locales. The DisplayName attribute or at least one of Title, GivenName, MiddleName, FamilyName, Suffix, or FullyQualifiedName attributes are required during create.

suffix.title: Suffix
suffix.description: Suffix of the name. For example, Jr. The DisplayName attribute or at least one of Title, GivenName, MiddleName, FamilyName, or Suffix attributes is required for object create.

given_name.title: Given Name
given_name.description: Given name or first name of a person. The DisplayName attribute or at least one of Title, GivenName, MiddleName, FamilyName, or Suffix attributes is required for object create.

family_name.title: Family Name
family_name.description: Family name or the last name of the person. The DisplayName attribute or at least one of Title, GivenName, MiddleName, FamilyName, or Suffix attributes is required for object create.

middle_name.title: Middle Name
middle_name.description: Middle name of the person. The person can have zero or more middle names. The DisplayName attribute or at least one of Title, GivenName, MiddleName, FamilyName, or Suffix attributes is required for object create.

display_name.title: Display Name
display_name.description: The name as displayed. Must be unique across all Customer, Vendor, and Employee objects. Cannot be removed with sparse update. If not supplied, the system generates DisplayName by concatenating customer name components supplied in the request from the following list: Title, GivenName, MiddleName, FamilyName, and Suffix.

tools.name: QUICKBOOKS_CREATE_EMPLOYEE
tools.description: Create a new employee in QuickBooks.

given_name.title: Given Name
given_name.description: Given name or Family name of a person. At least one of `given_name` or `family_name` attributes is required.

family_name.title: Family Name
family_name.description: Family name or the last name of the person. At least one of `given_name` or `family_name` attributes is required.

primary_addr.title: EmployeeAddress

lat.title: Lat
lat.description: Latitude coordinate of Geocode (Geospacial Entity Object Code). INVALID is returned for invalid addresses.

long.title: Long
long.description: Longitude coordinate of Geocode (Geospacial Entity Object Code). INVALID is returned for invalid addresses.

country.title: Country
country.description: Country name. For international addresses - countries should be passed as 3 ISO alpha-3 characters or the full name of the country.

postal_code.title: Postal Code
postal_code.description: Postal code. For example, zip code for USA and Canada.

country_sub_division_code.title: Country Sub Division Code
country_sub_division_code.description: Region within a country. For example, state name for USA, province name for Canada.

primary_addr.description: Represents the physical street address for this employee. If QuickBooks Payroll is enabled for the company, the following PhysicalAddress fields are required: City, CountrySubDivisionCode, PostalCode.

tools.name: QUICKBOOKS_CREATE_INVOICE
tools.description: Tool to create a new invoice in QuickBooks. Use after confirming customer and item details.

customer_id.description: ID of the customer to invoice (CustomerRef.value)

minorversion.title: Minorversion

inputSchema.description: Request parameters to create a new invoice in QuickBooks.

tools.name: QUICKBOOKS_CUSTOMER_BALANCE_DETAIL
tools.description: Generate a balance detail report for a customer in QuickBooks with the given customer ID.

columns.title: Columns
columns.description: Column types to be shown in the report. Supported Values: bill_addr, create_by, create_date, cust_bill_email, cust_comp_name, cust_msg, cust_phone_other, cust_tel, cust_name, deliv_addr, doc_num*, due_date*, last_mod_by, last_mod_date, memo*, sale_sent_state, ship_addr, ship_date, ship_via, term_name, tracking_num, tx_date*, txn_type*. Additional columns with custom fields enabled: sales_cust1, sales_cust2, sales_cust3. Additional columns with location tracking enabled: dept_name*

custom1.title: Custom1
custom1.description: Filter by the specified custom field as defined by the CustomField attribute in transaction entities where supported. Supported Values: Name of custom field.

shipvia.title: Shipvia
shipvia.description: Filter by the shipping method as stored in Invoice.ShipMethodRef.Name.

sort_by.title: Sort By
sort_by.description: The column type used in sorting report rows. Specify a column type as defined with the columns query parameter.

term_ids.title: Term Ids
term_ids.description: One or more comma separated term IDs. Filters report contents based on term or terms supplied.

end_duedate.title: End Duedate
end_duedate.description: The range of dates over which receivables are due, in the format YYYY-MM-DD. start_duedate must be less than end_duedate. If not specified, all data is returned.

report_date.title: Report Date
report_date.description: Start date to use for the report, in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

aging_method.title: AgingMethod
aging_method.description: The date upon which aging is determined.

customer_ids.title: Customer Ids
customer_ids.description: One or more comma separated customer IDs. Filters report contents to include information for specified customers.

start_duedate.title: Start Duedate
start_duedate.description: The range of dates over which receivables are due, in the format YYYY-MM-DD. start_duedate must be less than end_duedate. If not specified, all data is returned.

department_ids.title: Department Ids
department_ids.description: One or more comma separated department IDs. Filters report contents to include information for specified departments if so configured in the company file.

requestid.description: Optional idempotency key (<=50 chars) to prevent duplicate writes on retries.

minorversion.description: Optional QuickBooks API minorversion to access newer fields (e.g., 63).

Id.title: Id
Id.description: Unique identifier of the Invoice to update

sparse.title: Sparse
sparse.description: Flag to indicate a sparse (partial) update; must be true

SyncToken.title: Sync Token
SyncToken.description: Concurrency token; must match the latest from QuickBooks

invoice.description: Invoice object containing Id, SyncToken, sparse flag, and fields to update

inputSchema.description: Request for performing a sparse (partial) update on an existing Invoice.
